name: Dice Bomb - Merge Block Puzzle Game
name_original: Dice Bomb - Merge Block Puzzle Game
description:
Dice Bomb - Challenge and fun shine through every bit of this block-merging puzzle game!

You’ll be immersed in Dice Bomb from minimalistic design to absorbing gameplay. You aim for high scores by merging three or more same blocks nearby. Moreover, when you merge 3 bombs, they will instantly explode to destroy blocks around! Wahoo!

Plus, you can invite your friends to compete to see who is better. No a block puzzle fan could resist Dice Bomb! Get it to enjoy unlimited lives and endless fun!
